ygData.subject: Re: Planning
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Aaleku       mostly after 8pm        whenever im home  nil unless i m off      sat after 12mm
ygData.messageBody:
> Entreri wrote:
>
>
>
> --Original Message-----
> From: Sereph <garford@...>
> To: sg-everquest@onelist.com <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> Date: Saturday, June 12, 1999 12:21 PM
> Subject: [sg-everquest] Planning
>
> We really need more support classes.5 tanks(and strangely
> enough, most are paladins) out of 9 people is not a balance
> group and Leshrac is playing the only evil character in the
> whole group.
>
> If more tanks are created, I might change class to a druid
> or shaman
>
> Also, someone mind playing an evil character to support
> Leshrac?
>
> Again, I ask you people to state the time/how frequent you
> play. In addition, mind tellling me which trade skills you
> are persuding?
>
> The reason I asked about trade skills is to reduce the
> amount of money the whole group needs to spend in the long
> term before we can get useful stuff like armor from the
> skills.
>
> Additional Info
>
> Name Time played How often Trade skill
>
> Kelvyn 2pm to 12am, with Daily, at least Baking or tailoring
> regular breaks in until school
> between reopens
>
> Kellindel 9am to 4pm Weekdays only Tailoring and Blacksmithing

Aaleku mostly after 8pm whenever im home nil
unless i m off<ns> sat after 12mm
